lw3dge.graphics

Class EntityRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.graphics.EntityRenderer

  • public class EntityRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    A rendering class controlled by the MasterRenderer for rendering GraphicalEntities to the screen.
    Author:
    Jared Massa
    See Also:
    MasterRenderer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityRenderer(StaticShader shader, lw3dge.components.math.Matrix4f projectionMatrix)
      Generate a new EntityRenderer with a given shader program and projection matrix.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityRenderer

        public EntityRenderer(StaticShader shader,
                      lw3dge.components.math.Matrix4f projectionMatrix)
        Generate a new EntityRenderer with a given shader program and projection matrix.
        Parameters:
        shader - the shader program instructions on drawing entities.
        projectionMatrix - a 4x4 matrix for calculating depth projections.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        Prepare this renderer for a render frame (OpenGL stuff)

      • render

        public void render(java.util.Map<TexturedModel,java.util.List<GraphicalEntity>> entities)
        Render a set of entities based on the textured model of each entity
        Parameters:
        entities - a HashMap using TexturedModels as the key -(to be rendered)
